to.sven.androidrccar.client.framework

Interface IClientDependencyContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDependencyContainer<IClientFactory,IClientLogicListener>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientDependencyContainer

    public interface IClientDependencyContainer
extends IDependencyContainer<IClientFactory,IClientLogicListener>
    The IClientDependencyContainer contains all dependences of the ClientLogic and it's dependences.
    Author:
    sven
